title: Texture Related Question
content:
I know this isn't type related, but I tend to trust the opinions of the other designed on here so you you might be able to help. I need to create a texture similar to what's show in the background on this image:

[http://ollymoss.com/art/panic.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102034219/http:/ollymoss.com/art/panic.gif "http://ollymoss.com/art/panic.gif")

So the question: Do you have any good idea to make the texture or do you know any good keywords to use when searchign for it?
author: poor mans superman

comments.content: Imported German calf skin dyed blue, stretched on a chair seat and not dusted for a while.

Hello,  
search for leather,cracked, blue on something suchas istock.  
You can make it in photoshop but it is much easier to buy.  
If your going the creation route look at getting a leather texture, then using a variety of different filter in PS, maybe the mosaic filter for starters with a few different adjustment layers.  
Martin
